GroupInfo.title: Use Case "XMP": Experiences and Exemplars
GroupInfo.description: example queries that illustrate requirements gathered from the database and document communities.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q1
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: List books published by Addison-Wesley after 1991, including their year and title.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q2
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Create a flat list of all the title-author pairs, with each pair enclosed in a "result" element.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q3
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: For each book in the bibliography, list the title and authors, grouped inside a "result" element.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q4
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: For each author in the bibliography, list the author's name and the titles of all books by that author, grouped inside a "result" element.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q5
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: For each book found at both bstore1.example.com and bstore2.example.com, list the title of the book and its price from each source.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q6
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: For each book that has at least one author, list the title and first two authors, and an empty "et-al" element if the book has additional authors.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q7
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: List the titles and years of all books published by Addison-Wesley after 1991, in alphabetic order.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q8
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Find books in which the name of some element ends with the string "or" and the same element contains the string "Suciu" somewhere in its content. For each such book, return the title and the qualifying element.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q9
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In the document "books.xml", find all section or chapter titles that contain the word "XML", regardless of the level of nesting.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q10
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In the document "prices.xml", find the minimum price for each book, in the form of a "minprice" element with the book title as its title attribute.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q11
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: For each book with an author, return the book with its title and authors. For each book with an editor, return a reference with the book title and the editor's affiliation.

test-case.name: xmp-queries-results-q12
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Find pairs of books that have different titles but the same set of authors (possibly in a different order).
